metadata.title: Friday, 21st July, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to demolish the illegally constructed structures along the following railway reserve land in Lusaka District:
(i) Mandevu Township to Lilayi Police College; and (ii) Kabwata and Chilenje along Njanji Commuter Railway Line;
(b) when the demolition exercise will commence; and
(c) whether those who will be affected by the demolition exercise will be compensated.

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a water treatment plant in Kalumbila District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) whether the water supply will include the following areas:
(i) Manyama; (ii) Luwana East; (iii) Mumbezhi; and (iv) Kisasa; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the NakatamboNsalu - Cave road in Chitambo District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) when the construction of Kawawa Dam in Chiparamba Ward in Kasenengwa Parliamentary Constituency will commence, considering that the design and construction reports are ready;
(b) who the contractor for the project is; and
(c) what the cost of the project is.
(a) how many institutions, countrywide were offering tourism and hospitality courses, as of March, 2023; and
(b) at what levels the courses offered,were.

questions.minister: Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Co-operation
parts: (a) whether Zambians in the diaspora remitted any money into the country in the year 2022; and
(b) if so, how much, was remitted.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to improve the breed of cattle in Mulobezi District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the specific plans are; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to expand the runway at Mansa Airport in Mansa District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) when runway lighting will be installed at the Airport.

questions.minister: Minister of Green Economy and Environment
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to degazette part of Myafi Forest in Mkushi District to allow for human settlement;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) what the progress in the investigations of gassing that took place between 2019 and 2020 was, as of March, 2023;
(b) how many cases were active in court, as of the same date; and
(c) whether any convictions have been secured.
